description: This file defines an agent-based collaboration system for research and discussion on various topics, including agents for Reddit, HackerNews, academic papers, and Twitter, as well as a team that coordinates these agents to reach a consensus.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an autonomous research agent with specific tools and instructions.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: Represents a team of agents collaborating to achieve a common goal.

methods.name: aprint_response
methods.description: Runs the team to generate and stream a response based on a message.
